meanings.definition: A free-swimming, ciliated larva of certain cnidarians, such as jellyfish.
meanings.sent1: The planulae moved gracefully through the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the development of planulae in jellyfish.
meanings.sent3: The planulae had a race to see who could reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: The planulae danced in the ocean currents like tiny ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the delicate beauty of the planulae under the microscope.
